materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a river taken in Buitenzorg (Bogor), Indonesia. In the background of the photo is a view of the Mount Salak. The photograph shows dense foliage on either side of the river, with a small clearing at the bottom-left of the photograph. The edges of the photograph are curved. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Mount Salak from Ballavue Hotel, Buitenzorg, Java
subject_terms_2: Photographs Thomson, J. (John), 1837-1921 Bogor (Indonesia) Salak, Mount (Indonesia) Rivers
